attributes.action:
LET ME DRIVE - 
Change the insurance policy from the drivers to the actual car
attributes.background: Why in England do you have to insure the person and not the car? Why are there so many of us who could drive but can't afford to add themselves to their parents' insurance?  Please change the law so once the car is insured, all the house hold can drive it and make life so much easier for everyone!!!

rejection.details:
Decisions about what car insurance products to offer are a matter for individual insurers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653927

Create a state-owned car insurance provider
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/656026

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918
